title: Samsung Standard Remote Guide
ai_context_notes: This is a traditional IR remote with many buttons. Users may be confused by the number of options. Be direct and refer to buttons by their text labels.

buttons.name: Power
buttons.function: Turns the TV on or off.

buttons.name: Source
buttons.function: Switches between different inputs like HDMI, AV, etc.

steps.title: Turn On the TV
steps.description: Point the remote at the TV and press the red Power (⏻) button at the top.

steps.title: Select the Correct Input
steps.description: Press the 'SOURCE' button repeatedly until the correct input (e.g., 'HDMI 1') is highlighted on the screen. Press 'OK' or wait a moment to select it.

steps.title: Adjust Volume and Channel
steps.description: Use the 'VOL +/-' and 'CH +/-' rocker buttons to control the sound and change channels.
